Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
public class used to handle the creation of a match

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(GamesHandler gamesHandler, java.lang.String nickname, java.lang.String socketId, ClientConnectionHandler connection, int playersNumber, java.lang.String id)
      creates a new game
      Parameters:
      gamesHandler - represents the games handler
      nickname - represents the nickname of the player who created the game
      socketId - represents the id related to the socket connection of the player who created the game
      connection - represents the connection to the client who created the game
      playersNumber - indicates the number of player associated to the game
      id - represents the game's id

  • Method Details

    • getPlayers

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getPlayers()
      Returns:
      a map containing the players currently in the game and their related ID

    • getNickname

      public java.lang.String getNickname​(java.lang.String socketId)
      Parameters:
      socketId - represents the socket's id
      Returns:
      returns the nickname associated to the socket id

    • onReceivedMessage

      public void onReceivedMessage​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String socketID)
      sends the received message to the stateHandler
      Parameters:
      message - represents the message to send
      socketID - represents the sender's socket id

    • send

      public void send​(java.lang.String message, java.lang.String nickname)
      sends a message to the selected player
      Parameters:
      message - represents the message to send
      nickname - represents the message receiver

    • sendAll

      public void sendAll​(java.lang.String message)
      sends a message to all the players
      Parameters:
      message - represents the message to send

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname, java.lang.String socketId, ClientConnectionHandler connection)
      adds a new player to the game
      Parameters:
      nickname - represents the nickname of the added player
      socketId - represents the player's socket id
      connection - represents the player's socket connection

    • removePlayer

      public void removePlayer​(java.lang.String socketId)
      removes a player from the game
      Parameters:
      socketId - represents the removed player's socket id

    • isCorresponding

      public boolean isCorresponding​(java.lang.String socketId, java.lang.String nickname)
      Parameters:
      socketId - represents the id associated to the socket connection
      nickname - represents the player's nickname
      Returns:
      returns true if the id corresponds to to the selected nickname

    • containsPlayer

      public boolean containsPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Parameters:
      nickname - represents the name of the player
      Returns:
      returns true if the player is part of the match

    • containsID

      public boolean containsID​(java.lang.String socketId)
      Parameters:
      socketId - represents the socket's id
      Returns:
      returns true if the player associated to the selected id is part of the match

    • getId

      public java.lang.String getId()
      Returns:
      returns the match id

    • getPlayersNumber

      public int getPlayersNumber()
      Returns:
      returns the number of players associated to the match

    • getActualPlayers

      public int getActualPlayers()
      Returns:
      returns the number of players currently connected

    • canStart

      public boolean canStart()
      Returns:
      returns true if the game can start
